text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a quick and easy garlic bread
recipe as promised i told you when i
have leftover homemade garlic aioli
there it is alright I like to make
garlic bread with it so I'm going to
take a piece of just regular French
bread baguette it's not stale see it's
nice and soft I don't like using stale
bread for garlic bread use fresh bread
and then I'm going to put on a generous
spread of our homemade aioli and you
want to be really saturated so I like to
kind of spread it in smoosh it down and
then give it another spread now what
we're going to do is we're going to
roast these just like this with a little
bit of parmesan on and to me that makes
a really delicious quick easy garlic
bread surprisingly mild okay so listen
to me now and feel me later if you want
really strong garlic bread you need to
crush your chop up a couple cloves of
fresh garlic and add it to this topping
alright I like a subtle garlic bread
when it roasts when I bake this right
now it's going to cook the garlic and
it's going to sweeten it and it's not
going to have that sharp raw kind of
aioli garlic flavor which is a really
intense much much sharper peppery err
garlic flavor so this is going to be
very mellow so you adjust all right I
warned you don't say oh it's not garlic
enough all right so I'm going to put a
couple tablespoons of grated Reggiano
parmesan and it's going to go in a very
hot oven 450 for about 10 minutes and
why I like a hot oven
I want the edges of the bread and the
cheese to kind of caramelize I want to
stay soft in the middle
soaked with that delicious aioli and
there it is
what a beauty come on you want to make
that don't you so if that's your excuse
to make the aioli go for it I just do
when I have leftover Italy and to finish
off very very recommended some coarsely
chopped fresh Italian parsley not just
beautiful although it is beautiful but
really that's their fresh parsley does
counteract garlic so it freshens your
breath it's really healthy for you and
it's just a great combination so give
that a try all the ingredients are on
the site
and as always enjoy
